text: Y's Men International is an international group of volunteers in support of YMCA. Y's Men International It was established in 1922 in Toledo, Ohio, U.S. and is now headquartered in Geneva, Switzerland. Y's Men International - Our History It was originally founded as a Service club to support the work of the World Alliance of YMCAs. The first club outside North America was formed in Shanghai, China in 1924. ==References== ==External links== * Official site Category:YMCA Category:International non-profit organizations Category:International organisations based in Switzerland Category:Organisations based in Geneva
title: Y's Men International
